Zephaniah or Sophonias__01.2__Gathering, I will gather: : That is, I will assuredly take away, and wholly consume, either by captivity, or death, both men and beasts out of this land.
Zephaniah or Sophonias__01.4__The wardens: : Viz., of the temples of the idols. AEdituos, in Hebrew, the Chemarims, that is, such as kindle the fires, or burn incense.
Zephaniah or Sophonias__01.10__The Second: : A part of the city so called.
Zephaniah or Sophonias__01.11__The Morter: : Maktesh. A valley in or near Jerusalem. Ibid.
Zephaniah or Sophonias__01.11__The people of Chanaan: : So he calls the Jews, from their following the wicked ways of the Chanaanites.
Zephaniah or Sophonias__01.12__Settled on their lees: : That is, the wealthy, and such as live at their ease, resting upon their riches, like wine upon the lees.
